table.title: DP TCP UHBR20 Cascaded Retimer/Mux topology Notes

entry.p: Microstrip main route routing must be interleaved.
To reduce system RFI/ EMI, it is recommended to use SL instead of MS. If MS routing is needed, refer to EMC PDG for RFI/ EMI mitigation.
Nominal 100 nF recommended (75 nF to 265 nF including tolerance).
Total insertion loss budget from CPU pins to retimer/MUX pins
17 dB @ 10 GHz. Inclusive of HVM variation.
Must adhere to fiberweave related best routing practices (#406926).
Barlow ridge and Parade mux/retimer. Retimer Rx should meet VESA spec requirements.
